GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
nfc: st21nfca: fix incorrect sizing calculations in EVT_TRANSACTION

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit cdd9227373f29bd68a1729dc33105026ff3202f6, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit 26fc6c7f02cb26c39c4733de3dbc3c0646fc1074. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: nfc: st21nfca: fix incorrect sizing calculations in EVT_TRANSACTION
